title: Great Apartment Community Across from Desert Bloom Park!
posting_body: ['Property Address: 8400 S. Maryland Parkway, Las Vegas, NV 89123', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Website:  <URL>', 'Parkside Villas Apartment Homes boasts the best of all worlds -- a fine residential location that is across the street from Desert Bloom Park and exciting restaurants and shopping, and where a short drive puts you in the middle of all the action and nightlife of the Las Vegas Strip.', 'The 215 Beltway and I-15 are easily accessible and make getting to the McCarran International Airport and the famed Las Vegas Strip a breeze.', 'Parkside Villas is professionally managed by FPI.', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES:', '•\tRecycling', '•\tOn-Site Maintenance', '•\tNight Patrol', '•\tFree Weights', '•\tCourtyard', '•\tCarport', '•\tResort-Style Pool with Cabana', '•\tResort-Style Spa', '•\tFitness Center onsite and fully-loaded', '•\tBBQ Area', '•\tW Lounge to relax, socialize and connect.', '•\tClubhouse', '•\tPlanned Events and Activities for Residents', '•\tComplimentary Daily Refreshments with Coffee Bar', '•\tFree Wi-Fi Access', '•\tGated Community', '•\tLush Landscaping', '•\tValet Trash & Onsite Recycling', '•\tProfessional On-Site Management Staff', '•\tPackage Delivery Lockers', '•\tPrint & Connect', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES:', '•\tSingle-Story Floor Plans', '•\tHardwood-Look Flooring in Select Homes', '•\tBreakfast Bar', '•\tBuilt-In Microwave Oven', '•\tGas Range', '•\tCeiling fans', '•\tCentral Air Conditioning and Heating', '•\tCustom Accent Walls Available', '•\tIn-Home Full-Size Washer and Dryer', '•\tCovered Patio/Balcony', '•\tPre-Wired Alarm System', '•\tVolume Ceilings', '•\t24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', 'Hours:', 'Monday: 9:00 to 6:00', 'Tuesday: 9:00 to 6:00', 'Wednesday: 9:00 to 6:00', 'Thursday: 9:00 to 6:00', 'Friday: 9:00 to 6:00', 'Saturday: 10:00 to 5:00', 'Sunday: 10:00 to 5:00', 'We look forward to welcoming you to our community!']
